summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5782 for the improvement of 46th Avenue Southwest, and same produced, from West Hinds Street to West Hanford Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 76214 as amended by Ordinance No. 76836, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
